docs.abstract: Richard Bernstein reviews book Eat Fat, by Richard Klein; Klein photo (S)
docs.lead_paragraph: EAT FAT By Richard Klein Illustrated. 247 pages. Pantheon. $24. Richard Klein, who ascended to the Contrarians' Hall of Fame with his book ''Cigarettes Are Sublime'' a couple of years ago, has done it again. Last time he wrote of the pleasures and the cultural importance of smoking. This time the subject is fat.
